ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
assimp:
- 6.0.3
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libboost_devel:
- '1.88'
libboost_python_devel:
- '1.88'
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
qhull:
- '2020.2'
target_platform:
- linux-64

name: coal-split

about.summary: An extension of the Flexible Collision Library
An extension of the Flexible Collision Library

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "coal" %}
{% set cppname = "lib" + name %}
{% set pythonname = name + "-python" %}
{% set version = "3.0.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/coal-library/{{ name }}/releases/download/v{{ version }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 899eb343ee7d86ae6312401bc969d1d2cb8103a5a67af5e1f06061a9c5fb0743

build:
  number: 1

outputs:
  - name: {{ cppname }}
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage(cppname, max_pin='x.x.x') }}
    script: build_cppcoal.sh  # [not win]
    script: build_cppcoal.bat  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - clang  # [win]
        - cmake
        - ninja
        # XML generation seem to be broken in some doxygen version
        - doxygen <1.9.8|>=1.11,<1.13
      host:
        - eigen
        - assimp
        - octomap
        - libboost-devel
        - qhull
        - qhull-static  # [not win]
      run:
        - libboost-devel
        # Since qhullcpp is leaking in header file
        # consumer will need it to build against coal
        - qhull-static  # [not win]
    test:
      requires:
        - pkg-config
      commands:
        - pkg-config --modversion {{ name }}
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/lib{{ name }}${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]

  - name: {{ pythonname }}
    script: build_coal_python.sh  # [not win]
    script: build_coal_python.bat  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - python                                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
        - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}     # [build_platform != target_platform]
        - numpy                                  # [build_platform != target_platform]
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - clang  # [win]
        - cmake
        - ninja
        # XML generation seem to be broken in some doxygen version
        - doxygen <1.9.8|>=1.11,<1.13
        - pylatexenc  # [not win]
        - lxml  # [not win]
      host:
        - eigen
        - assimp
        - octomap
        - libboost-devel
        - qhull
        - qhull-static  # [not win]
        - python
        - libboost-python-devel
        - eigenpy
        # On Windows, Numpy 2.0 don't allow to export the PY_ARRAY_UNIQUE_SYMBOL.
        # This has been fixed in Numpy 2.1.
        - numpy >=2.1      # [win and py>=310]
        # Unfortunatly, Numpy 2.1 is not distributed with Python 3.9.
        # We are forced to use Numpy 1 in this case.
        - numpy >=1.19,<2  # [win and py<310]
        - numpy            # [not win]
        - {{ pin_subpackage(cppname, exact=true) }}
      run:
        - python
        - numpy >=2.1      # [win and py>=310]
        - numpy >=1.19,<2  # [win and py<310]
        - {{ pin_subpackage(cppname, exact=true) }}
    test:
      imports:
        - coal
  - name: {{ name }}
    requirements:
      host:
        # Explicitely add a python requirement so that the hash changes between python version
        - python
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage(cppname, exact=true) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage(pythonname, exact=true) }}
    test:
      requires:
        - pkg-config
      imports:
        - coal
      commands:
        - pkg-config --modversion {{ name }}
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/lib{{ name }}${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]

about:
  home: https://github.com/coal-library/coal
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: An extension of the Flexible Collision Library
  dev_url: https://github.com/coal-library/coal

extra:
  feedstock-name: coal
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jorisv
    - jcarpent
    - ymontmarin
    - lmontaut

about.summary: An extension of the Flexible Collision Library
